review: very satisfy. Less one star just for the remote: too small and difficult to type words...
author: william halim

review: I like it. It's a good deal for the price. It was easy to set up. I didn't have any problems. I corrected the cord into the HMI on the back of the TV and connected it to my Wi-Fi and was done in 10 minutes.
author: DOREATHER HARVEY

review: Fire TV Stick has been such a breeze to set up and get it going. I've used Netflix and Sling TV and the quality of picture & sound is amazing. I also have Chromecast at home and for the last 6 months, there is always a problem streaming Netflix. FireTV Stick seems to hold a lot of promise. I will update my review later if I run into any issues.Go for it!!
author: Hank Reardon "discerningBuyer"

review: This fire stick doesn't quite meet the mark no matter where I plug it in or how close to my quantum speed Internet connection it is it still tells me I don't have enough connectivity speed. Always buffering...
author: NeeCee Mo "Denise B. Moore"

review: This is a great product!  Once I put the batteries in right, I had it up and running no time flat.  Thank you Amazon!
author: Vickie O'Bryant

review: It's a great idea, but I get better wireless access with my IPad than with the Fire TV stick.
author: Cheryl Baker

review: I cant register mine. Phone number to ccontact customer service would help. It wont accept my email. Help please.
author: Sherry S.

review: So far it's been working great!!!
author: Elizabeth Fogelmark
